snippet: Tim Tebow connected with Demaryius Thomas on an 80-yard touchdown pass on the first play of overtime to lift the Broncos past the favored Steelers in their wild-card game.
abstract: Denver Broncos defeat Pittsburgh Steelers, 29-23, in overtime to win AFC wild-card game; Broncos quarterback Tim Tebow connects with receiver Demaryius Thomas on an 80-yard touchdown pass on the first play of overtime to clinch walk-off victory.
lead_paragraph: Tim Tebow connected with Demaryius Thomas on an 80-yard touchdown pass on the first play of overtime to lift the Broncos past the favored Steelers in their wild-card game.

headline.seo: Quick Strike From Tebow Helps Broncos Edge Steelers
headline.main: Quick Strike From Tebow Helps Broncos Edge Steelers
headline.print_headline: Tebow Tops Even Himself For Drama
